Package adept.serialization

Provides interfaces and classes for ADEPT data (de)serialization in XML, JSON and Binary format

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ISerializer
    Interface that supports methods for serialization.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSerializer
    Abstract class for serialization that enforces a srialization type to be specified.
    BinaryFromJSONSerializer
    The Class BinaryFromJSONSerializer.
    JSONSerializer
    JSON serializer.
    XMLSerializer
    Performs XML serialization.
    XmlToAnnotation
    The Class XmlToAnnotation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SerializationType
    The Enum SerializationType.

Package adept.serialization Description

Provides interfaces and classes for ADEPT data (de)serialization in XML, JSON and Binary format
